verbs.description: The fire [V: is] raging through the middle floors of the 33-storey Trump International Hotel and Tower in Baku , with six fire crews battling the blaze but there were no reports of injuries .

[ARG0: The fire] is [V: raging] [ARG1: through the middle floors of the 33-storey Trump International Hotel and Tower in Baku] , [ARGM-ADV: with six fire crews battling the blaze but there were no reports of injuries] .

The fire is raging through the middle floors of the 33-storey Trump International Hotel and Tower in Baku , with [ARG0: six fire crews] [V: battling] [ARG1: the blaze] but there were no reports of injuries .
The fire is raging through the middle floors of the 33-storey Trump International Hotel and Tower in Baku , with six fire crews battling the blaze but there [V: were] [ARG1: no reports of injuries] .
